name: FossilQuest
description:
Explore, dig and showcase your findings in this fossil digging 3rd person adventure game.

You have just been offered a paleontologist & archeologist job at the Bonehill Museum! Help the museum director,  Dr. Cope to find, excavate and showcase any worth preserving items. Saving them from the claws of Mr. Marsh, the evil, black market antiquity trafficker.

FossilQuest is a work in progress and any existing content is subject to change. The downloadable is not complete and contains only a small WIP portion of the game.

Please feel free to leave your feedback & suggestions on the discussion board.
